headline: S&P Dow Jones Indices Announces Changes to the S&P/TSX Composite Index
summary: Following the completion of the plan of arrangement between Equinox Gold (TSX: EQX) and Calibre Mining (TSX:CXB) resulting in the combination of the two companies. Each share of Calibre Mining will be exchanged for 0.35 new Equinox Gold shares. In expectation of final closing conditions being met, Calibre Mining's shares will be removed from the S&P/TSX Composite Index prior to the open of trading on June 23, 2025. The shares outstanding of Equinox Gold will be increased at the same time to refl

headline: Accenture Set to Report Q3 Earnings: Here's What You Should Know
summary: ACN is set to report third-quarter fiscal 2025 results, with growth across all segments and a 5.1% y/y EPS increase.

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Semtech and Analog Devices
summary: Semtech and Analog Devices show promise in a cautious chip market, fueled by AI, auto tech, and long-cycle industrial demand.

headline: 5 Dividend Stocks to Buy With $2,000 and Hold Forever
summary: Dividend stocks can provide investors with regular payments, making them ideal for those seeking passive income.  Because dividend payers tend to have sound, stable businesses, they can be a good source of income and stock price appreciation.  Investing in the stock market is an excellent way to build long-term wealth.
